Optional tilt

tilt: SpinorE3
  • Defined in davinci-eight/visual/BoxOptions.ts:55

Rotation (spinor) to be applied to the geometry at construction time to establish the reference orientation. This cannot be changed once the object has been created because it is burned-in to the vertex locations.

Optional width

width: number
  • Defined in davinci-eight/visual/BoxOptions.ts:50

The extent of the box in the x-axis direction.

Optional wireFrame

wireFrame: boolean
  • Defined in davinci-eight/visual/BoxOptions.ts:10

Determines whether the Box is rendered with lines or triangles.
